phrases: So do not bother me at a time like this!
I will kill anyone who tries to take a bite outta her!
With Sacred Jewel fragments in his right arm and both his legs...
he battles Inuyasha with amazing speed.
The Wolf-Demon Tribe is fighting the Birds of Paradise...
and are planning to steal Sacred Jewel fragments...
which the Birds of Paradise have in their possession.
I was kidnapped because I am able to see the Sacred Jewel.
some day, both Shippo and I will be eaten.
If I could only help Shippo escape.
I am taking the woman out for some fresh air.
Ginta and Hakkaku went out on patrol.
Shippo, you can expand and fly, cannot you?
Yes, but I do not know if I can fly with you!
What did I say about eating her?!
Koga, the little kid is way over there!
Let us go after him, Koga!
We are going to be killed!
Just to let your friend escape, huh?
You are going to be my woman.
Were not you going to eat her when you finished with her?
This woman can see the Sacred Jewel.
Not only the Birds of Paradise have the fragments.
We can gather all the fragments in this region.
So she is much more useful to us than some demon woman.
Kagome... that is what you are called?
From today, you are my woman.
S-say... do not touch me, stupid!
She is as good as dead.
It is rude to claim a girl as your woman.
Besides, I already have someone I am seeing.
My sweetheart has a name, Inuyasha!
Inuyasha is in love with Kikyo!
I see, so that is it?
Well, it is just as well.
Next time I see him, I will kill'i am!
And when this Inuyasha fella is dead, there will not be a problem.
Are they allies of the Wolf-Demon Tribe?
Inuyasha... get captured by these birds.
If this area is the hunting ground of these bird demons...
there should be bones and skeletons of wolves.
But there is not a single one.
So they are in alliance with the Wolf-Demon Tribe?
If I get captured, I will get taken to their nest...
I will be able to save Kagome and we will live happily ever after.
Why could not you be the one who gets captured?
You are built much more sturdily than I am!
Miroku, are not we going to follow?
We will let some distance build between us.
I must hurry and get Inuyasha!
I let him out of my sight for just a while.
If only I had been more diligent!
We wanted that bird to take him to the den of the Wolf-Demon Tribe.
The Birds of Paradise and the Wolf-Demon Tribe are bitter enemies.
Kagome is in the den of the Wolf-Demon Tribe.
And there is a mountain of wolf bones.
So the Birds of Paradise and the Wolf-Demon Tribe are enemies?!
At this moment, I am not angry at Wolf-Demons or you birds!
The one I want to kill right now... is you, Miroku!
Come down here and fight me, Miroku!
We must hurry and rescue Kagome.
Do not you dare leave me!
The Birds of Paradise nest in this mountain?
Somewhere in this mountain is one who has the Sacred Jewel.
There is a Sacred Jewel fragment here in this mountain.
I am leaving the small fry to you!
Do you see the Sacred Jewel fragment?
I cannot look while you fight!
I see it right before us!
We have been waiting, Wolf-Demon brat.
You have Sacred Jewel fragments on your body.
We brothers have sought your fragments.
To think you would come to us.
Kagome, where is the Sacred Jewel fragment?
The fragment is inside its mouth.
If you want the Sacred Jewel fragment, you must come inside our mouth!
But what are you going to do, Koga?
I will cut up its mouth with this!
You are going after the fragment in its mouth?
Only I can take on that giant ugly bird!
We will get you to safety.
He will be taken to their nest and devoured!
The Wolf-Demons and the Birds of Paradise...
We have to do something about the Birds of Paradise!
I will take care of them.
If you value your life... stand back!
That mutt-face... what a time for him to show up.
I have no time to take you on right now.
I will let you go for today.
You dared to kidnap Kagome and you are going to pay right now!
You can run away, but keep your hands off my woman.
A woman who can see the Sacred Jewel...
Now she is perfect for me.
Kagome, did you hear what he said?
He is just making it all up!
How dare you tell such lies?!
I am in love with Kagome!
Kagome is better off with me!
Much better than sticking to some weak mutt!
So that she can make a clean break from you...
I am going to kill you one day!
Then Kagome... you will be free to fall in love with me!
Actually, I am quite envious of his personality.
I am too busy, I said.
She is calling out to him?!
First, we will tear off your right arm!
The fragment on my right arm!
It is after the fragments on my legs!
Shaddup and watch, you puny wolf!
Bear witness to my true strength!
Now we have two Sacred Jewel fragments!
Power, we will soon have more power!
Now I draw out the true power of Tetsusaiga!
He killed that giant demon in one swing!
You have mastered the Wind Scar!
We have gotten rid of the pesky birds.
So let us settle this once and for all!
Settle it once and for all?!
This is no time for that!
Why is she taking his side?!
I can kill the likes of you with just my left arm!
Why did you let him go?
besides, he was not all that bad.
Were not you kidnapped and almost killed?!
But he did protect me, too.
So you fell in love with him?
Well, after he declared his love so boldly, how could she hate him?
The Bird of Paradise had one piece...
Koga had the other one in his right arm.
Will not he come back for it?
When Koga and Inuyasha meet the next time...
Kagome, go and put Inuyasha's mind at ease.
He was so worried about you.
I pity him the way he is.
I am sorry I worried you.
Thank you so much for saving me.
Would not you have preferred that I did not save you?
Taken in by his sweet words.
Because he said he loved me?
Is that what is bothering you?
Let me make one thing clear.
I do not feel anything for Koga!
Let us not talk about it anymore!
What really happened between you two?
Just what are you suspecting me of?!
Is that how you have been seeing me?!
W-what are you scolding me for?!
I do not want to see your face anymore!
What are you going to do?
Kagome is scary when she is mad.
I am not scared at all, stupid!
Since I started crossing between the present and the Feudal Era...
this is the first time I have gotten so angry.
I will never forgive that Inuyasha!
But something is strange... as though I have forgotten something valuable.
My... my youth as a ninth grader is supposed to be in the present time.
Next on Inuyasha: Two Hearts, One Mind
